comedies.title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
comedies.actors: Will Ferrell, Christina Applegate, Steve Carell
comedies.description: Ron Burgundy is San Diego's top rated newsman in the male dominated broadcasting of the 1970's, but that's all about to change when a new female employee with ambition to burn arrives in his office.

comedies.title: Happy Gilmore
comedies.description: A rejected hockey player puts his skills to the golf course to save his grandmother's house.

comedies.title: 30 Minutes or Less
comedies.actors: Jesse Eisenberg, Danny McBride, Aziz Ansari, Nick Swardson
comedies.description: Two fledgling criminals kidnap a pizza delivery guy, strap a bomb to his chest, and inform him that he has mere hours to rob a bank or else...

comedies.title: Step Brothers
comedies.description: Two aimless middle-aged losers still living at home are forced against their will to become roommates when their parents get married.

comedies.title: Superbad
comedies.description: Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry.
